#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<vector>
#include<queue>
using namespace std;
typedef long long LL;
vector<LL> arr;

LL gcd(LL a, LL b)
{
    LL x;

    while (b!=0)
    {
        x = b;
        b = a%b;
        a = x;
    }
    return a;
}

int main()
{
    //cout<<gcd(14,32);
    int t;
    long long a,b,I,x,j,k;
    cin>>t;
    while (t--)
    {
        arr.clear();
        cin>>a>>b>>I;
        x=gcd(a,b);
        arr.push_back(0);
        for (int i=1;i<=(b/x)-1;i++)
        {
            arr.push_back(a*i);
        }
        for (int i=1;i<=(a/x)-1;i++)
        {
            arr.push_back(b*i);
        }
        sort(arr.begin(),arr.end());
        //arr.pop_back();
       /* for (int i=0;i<arr.size();i++)
        cout<<arr[i]<<endl;*/
        k = I%arr.size();
        cout<<(a*b/x)*(I/arr.size()) + arr[k]<<endl;

    }
}
